alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 8:59PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southeastern Greenville and southwestern Spartanburg Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 859 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fountain Inn, or 15 miles southeast of Greenville Downtown, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Simpsonville, Fountain Inn, Woodruff, Gray Court, and Enoree. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
